entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning and early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
